pages.text: Fishing rods with the $(item)Fish Fighter$() enchantment will track the number of fish caught (experience).$(br2)The more familiar you are with an old rod, the easier it becomes to catch rarer fish.$(br2)Once the required number of catches (experience) is met,

and then you can upgrade the rod using the next level of the Fish Fighter enchantment book at an $(item)anvil$():$(br)$(li) Level 1 requirement: 0 catches$(br)$(li) Level 2 requirement: 25 catches$(br)$(li) Level 3 requirement: 85 catches

$(li) Level 4 requirement: 175 catches$(br)$(li) Level 5 requirement: 335 catches$(br2)If the enchantment book level exceeds the current rod level, such as using a level V book on a level I rod, the rod can only be upgraded to level II.
